summary: Dragonborn has been around for a while, and knowledge of staff crafting is becoming open to those with the gold and room.
descriptionHtml:
In short only Major cities house staff crafting tables, these aren't placed in any of the players homes vanilla/Hearthfire/Dawnguard, this about minimal convenience.  They do not sell Heartstones you have to gather them yourself. 

This mod is open to anyone edit it how you like, I made it for myself because I didn't want to have to steep so deep into the Main Quest just so I could make a staff. I'm just sharing it.
author: Daseezequeen
